name: photo-scorer-desktop
description: Photo Scorer Desktop App - Electron + React + Python Sidecar
author: Francis Brero

scripts.build: npm run build:main && npm run build:renderer
scripts.build:sidecar: cd sidecar && uv pip install -e ../../../ && uv pip install pyinstaller && uv run python -m PyInstaller --onedir --name sidecar --hidden-import uvicorn.logging --hidden-import uvicorn.loops --hidden-import uvicorn.loops.auto --hidden-import uvicorn.protocols --hidden-import uvicorn.protocols.http --hidden-import uvicorn.protocols.http.auto --hidden-import uvicorn.protocols.websockets --hidden-import uvicorn.protocols.websockets.auto --hidden-import uvicorn.lifespan --hidden-import uvicorn.lifespan.on --collect-all photo_score --add-data '../../../configs:configs' server.py && mkdir -p ../sidecar-dist && cp -r dist/sidecar/* ../sidecar-dist/
